subject: Re: [cc-community] Multinational Profit Day
body:
>
> It seems to me that the Free Culture movement is co-opting yet another
> multinational capitalist corporation.
>
> -Evan


Oh right yeah. Like that's the way it's happening. I'm starting to  
feel sorry for IBM, Apple, Sun, Sony and all the suckers at the mercy  
of the *killer* instincts of the Free Culture/Creative Commons  
movement. Ooh, I'll get you you nasty corporation, take this free  
photo, yeah, and this free movie, yeah go on, bet you're scared  
now... here have all my life.. go on.. ha.. we got you.. what you  
gonna do now? Its all SHARED... ha ha... FREE... he he... see how we  
*twist* your corporate minds...

Myspace? Facebook? Youtube? Web 2.0?  Wrap free user-produced content  
in advertising, subscription and micropayments? Make millions through  
an IPO? Cash out on all the sucker investors and pensions companies  
who can't tell new technology from their elbow? Another stock boom,  
lots of rich young things in the valley?

Shit. Didn't see that one coming.

He who sups with the devil should use a long spoon....
